Reviews.Title: Easy to use feature rich basic phone
Reviews.Author: Bob "Bob in Big Bear Ca"
Reviews.Content: I bought this with a 2 year contract with Verizon awhile back. At the time it was a great phone that served all of my needs. The QTRY keyboard was easy to use, plus it was light weight user friendly. Sending text with photo or video attachment where as easy as any phone I've had or easier. I loved this phone and the only reason I upgraded to a smart phone was there was a huge discount on the Droid on my next contract.Over all I liked this phone better than the droid 2. It's a very simple to use phone that really is packed with features ( though smaller the display is tiny compared to newer phones ) for a basic phone. I would recommend this phone for someone that  wants good quality phone calls, plus texting with picture/video attachments without having to take a class to use the phone.

Reviews.Author: Dashisinthis83
Reviews.Content: This good phone but it is held back by a suspect battery and there is a high chance that some or most of your keys may stop working.

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: jabo
Reviews.Content: have had this phone for 4 years, never had any trouble with this phone, even after all this time the battery still holds a charge great

Reviews.Title: Great Phone! Best feature phone out there!
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: If you're looking for a hardy non-smartphone that's great for texting with a great camera that has a long battery life, this is for you. This is the first phone I ever bought six years ago. The phone took a beating (the worst being a fall off a roof into a bucket of water), but held together for over four years. When it came time to get a new phone, rather than upgrade to a smartphone and pay absurd data fees (which I was told was the only option from Verizon), I came on Amazon and purchased the phone and took it in to Verizon to have them activate it. They weren't pleased, but I am. This phone has great software, loud speakers, big screen inside, texts fast, and feels solid in your hands. I can't say I have any reservations about this phone.

Reviews.Title: no scratches, terrible battery
Reviews.Author: lindsay
Reviews.Content: This phone looks brand new and all the buttons and what not works. The only problem is the battery is a piece of crap and holds zero charge. I would not recommend this to anyone since I have to take my charger everywhere with me. Do not buy.

Reviews.Title: Had to return......
Reviews.Author: Lori
Reviews.Content: The phone came quickly and was perfect, the only thing, which isn't really the sellers fault, is that I guess the phone needed to be updated by a certain date and if it wasn't done then you could no longer get updates and such for it.  Well it wasn't updated so it just didn't work properly so I had to return it.

Reviews.Title: Good phone at a great price
Reviews.Author: bigjoe
Reviews.Content: The phone arrived an the day they told, put the battery in and fired right up with no problems! A little worn around the edge's but good enough for a teenager and there was no scratches on the screens. I took it to Verizon they had no problems programming it and porting over all her contacts and picture's. I would definitely buy from them again!

Reviews.Title: One of the best phones !!!
Reviews.Author: DEDE LEWIS
Reviews.Content: For thoughs of you who are no I Phone lovers and still like buttons this is one of the best phones ever made.Do not understand why Verizon stopped selling it.

Reviews.Title: its okay
Reviews.Author: Ines pabon
Reviews.Content: i thought this item was good except when i got the memory slot was messed up i bought one brandnew and it wouldnt take,this is something i got for my daughter and was upset due to this problem

Reviews.Title: Served its purpose
Reviews.Author: T. Hills
Reviews.Content: I needed a new phone but didn't want to change my basic data plan with my carrier. I have a blackberry and iPad with work so I didn't need more connections...just a personal phone that I can text more easily with. It's good. I do find its hard to read the screen at times, but its OK.

Reviews.Title: LG V X9100 EnV2 phone
Reviews.Author: c-miss
Reviews.Content: I loved my previous phone which is just like this one.  It suits my needs for which I use it for and it is NOT a smart phone which I do notwant.  I enjoy it and I would recommend it to anyone who likes a simple and easy to use phone.  I also did not have to have a contractwith this phone which I like....  Thanks for the option available to buy it!!!!

Reviews.Title: I Love this cellphone
Reviews.Author: K. Griffin
Reviews.Content: I have had my LG VX 9100 for approximately a year and I really love this phone.  It has so many features and it's not too expensive.  This phone has a good weight on it, it's not a cheap phone.  The only thing I wish is that the camera had a build in flash when you take pictures, other than that I really really satisfied with my phone.  Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Gets the job done, giving 4 stars, preferred my LG Verizon Chocolate to this model...
Reviews.Author: Virgil
Reviews.Content: Giving this phone 4 stars.  It gets the job done and like the other users the only complaint I have about the phone itself is the battery life, that's why it gets 4 stars.Like other users the battery life could be better.As for personal preferences:-I preferred my old LG Verizon Chocolate with the thumb-wheel to scroll contacts;-as opposed to the Chocolate, you have to open the phone to read text messages;-this particular phone does not appear to have a combination ring and vibrate function;-does not have "voice mail" option on the menue--on this version you have to press "1" and then "send"; and,-for me an odd answering function; i.e. press the send button answer a call...

Reviews.Title: No data plan required
Reviews.Author: LMK
Reviews.Content: This is one of the few models that does not require adata plan.  Easy to use key pad for texting.  Has vibrateand silent modes.  Has calendar, note pad, speaker, several features.Very pleased with this phone and its features.After several months and a few drops, phone works, but doesturn off from time to time.

Reviews.Title: UGH.
Reviews.Author: DaniDanger
Reviews.Content: This phone...  oh god, this phone.  I bought TWO even though I read the awful reviews.THIS PHONE.  It randomly shuts off.  My keypad is literally falling off seven months after I bought it.  I charge it ALL DAY, make ONE CALL, and IT DIES.Do. Not. Buy. This. Phone.

Reviews.Title: bad condition
Reviews.Author: Mila
Reviews.Content: when I bought it it said very good condition, when it came it was pretty bad. It was not charging, scratches all over. I had to return it.

Reviews.Title: returning phone
Reviews.Author: Marguerite Nulty
Reviews.Content: I like the phone but have to return it because the batter will not stay charged for more than 2 calls.

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: nanniec
Reviews.Content: I love this phone.  It replaced the previous one I had ordered.  It has all the functionsthat I need.  It was shipped quickly.

Reviews.Title: Just what I needed
Reviews.Author: Orlando Hill
Reviews.Content: Phone is great for thet. price it was purchased at and the use I have planned for it. I would this item again if it was needed.

Reviews.Title: looks can be deceiving
Reviews.Author: cfernandez
Reviews.Content: Shipping was on time and when first opened the phone seemed fine.  After I activated the phone I tryed to remove the plastic packing film that comes on the scfeens of all "new" phones, when I did that the hole front screen came off with it.  Also the USB cable used for chraging was bent so I would have to bend it just to get a charge. It seemed to me that this phone was not NEW as advertised but REFURBISHED. Im very upset and stuck.

Reviews.Title: Turned Off
Reviews.Author: James McMillan
Reviews.Content: Had to stick a piece of paper under battery to keep phone from cutting off when open screen.  Wish this detail was identified in advertisement

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Sherry Streeter
Reviews.Content: I think the EnV2 is one of the best phones made it is very reliable.The had one for about 7 years and after dropping it countless times, the kids playing with it, being ran over it still worked.

Reviews.Title: It didn't even work
Reviews.Author: Kristen
Reviews.Content: The phones voice box was muffled and it wouldnt even charge so i couldnt use it. I was very disappointed in it and i wont be buying from this seller ever again.

Reviews.Title: Durable
Reviews.Author: De
Reviews.Content: Got this a couple months ago. It wasn't brand new but is still going strong. Very durable and works great.

Reviews.Title: Decent phone, battery could be better
Reviews.Author: bwise
Reviews.Content: I like this phone. Good qwerty keypad. Some say it's too small for texting but I have large hands and not a problem.As dumb phones go, this is perfectly fine.

Reviews.Title: Fabulous
Reviews.Author: Marty E
Reviews.Content: I love this phone.  I do not have to put my fingers all over a screen to use it, much cleaner.  I had one of these phones for several years and it finally wore out.  I was so happy when I was able to replace it.

Reviews.Title: GOOD
Reviews.Author: H.R.
Reviews.Content: i dont like the protuct it looks too cheap i thought that it is better than my old one it looks worse THANK YOU

Reviews.Title: Poor battery life
Reviews.Author: frus
Reviews.Content: The phone works well overall. Texting is easy and the call quality is good. The battery life is poor. I use the phone very infrequently but in stand by the battery goes dead within two days. If I use the phone it has to be charged multiple times during the day.

Reviews.Title: Lg phone
Reviews.Author: KENDRA LIGHT
Reviews.Content: Very disappointed in this purchase. The phone looked good when it came but only worked for a day! I couldn't find my receipt ao I feel like we got "stuck"! Very disappointed! Do not recommend buying from this buyer! Was mislead!

ProductInfo.Features:
Sleeker, redesigned clamshell phone opens to reveal QWERTY keyboard and large 2.4-inch screen
Access Verizon's V Cast Music and Video service via fast EV-DO data network; GPS-enabled for turn-by-turn directions (Data Plan Required)
2-megapixel camera with video capture; Bluetooth for headsets and music streaming; microSD memory card. (Card not included)
Up to 5.3 hours of talk time, up to 520 hours (21+ days) of standby time
Includes Phone, Rechargeable Battery, Wall Charger
ProductInfo.Name: LG VX9100 EnV2 for Verizon (Black) QWERTY - Camera - No New Annual Contract Required
